summary: Setup OpenTUI/SolidJS: Updated package.json (removed ink/react, added @opentui/core, @opentui/solid, solid-js, babel-preset-solid). Updated tsconfig.json with jsx=preserve, jsxImportSource=@opentui/solid. Updated tsup.config.ts with esbuild jsx options. Created minimal index.tsx with render() and box/text/b elements. Build passes (562 B). Key learnings: OpenTUI uses <b>/<strong> tags for bold, not bold prop.
